subject: Soccer
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The speculation that Thierry Henry would be joining the Red Bulls of Major League Soccer has been around longer than the French team’s stay in South Africa for the 2010 World Cup.
snippet: The speculation that Thierry Henry would be joining the Red Bulls of Major League Soccer has been around longer than the French team’s stay in South Africa for the 2010 World Cup.
